root: ^I'm sure that other dino told you about me.
^It's shaped like a turtle to represent the head of the academy.
^Each boss you've fought in the dungeon is in each end of the turtle.
^When you first entered you should be at the "head" of the turtle.
^I would suggest taking out the other bosses in the training room before challenging me at the tail of the turtle.
^The "dungeon stats" that I mentioned earlier is permanent and is quite convenient to show progress.
^The higher the stats, the better the training is going to be.
